title: Terms of Service
sections.introduction.title: Introduction
sections.introduction.content: Welcome to FindClass.nz ('we', 'our', or 'us'). These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your use of our website and services. By accessing or using FindClass.nz, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our platform.
sections.acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
sections.acceptance.content: By creating an account, accessing, or using our services, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms, our Privacy Policy, and any other applicable policies. If you are using our services on behalf of an organization, you represent that you have the authority to bind that organization to these Terms.
sections.services.title: Our Services
sections.services.content: FindClass.nz provides a platform for connecting students with tutors and educational institutions in New Zealand. Our services include:
sections.services.item2: Direct communication between students and tutors
sections.services.item3: Reviews and ratings for courses and tutors
sections.userResponsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
sections.userResponsibilities.content: As a user of FindClass.nz, you agree to:
sections.userResponsibilities.item1: Provide accurate, current, and complete information when creating an account
sections.userResponsibilities.item2: Maintain the security of your account credentials
sections.userResponsibilities.item3: Use our services only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms
sections.tutorTerms.title: Tutor Terms
sections.tutorTerms.content: If you are a tutor using our platform, you agree to:

sections.tutorTerms.item2: Conduct classes in a professional manner

sections.platformRights.content: FindClass.nz reserves the following rights to maintain a safe and trustworthy platform:
sections.platformRights.item1: The right to remove any course, content, or information that violates our policies or terms of service
sections.platformRights.item2: The right to suspend or ban users who receive excessive reports or violate our community guidelines
sections.platformRights.item3: The right to suspend or ban tutors whose courses receive excessive negative reports or complaints
sections.platformRights.item4: The right to terminate accounts without prior notice for severe violations or repeated policy breaches
sections.platformRights.item5: The right to cooperate with law enforcement authorities when required by law
sections.liability.title: Limitation of Liability
sections.liability.content: FindClass.nz acts as an intermediary platform connecting students and tutors. We are not responsible for the quality, accuracy, or outcomes of educational services provided by tutors. While we strive to verify tutor qualifications, we cannot guarantee the accuracy of all information posted on our platform. Users are encouraged to exercise their own judgment when selecting courses and tutors.

sections.termination.content: We reserve the right to terminate or suspend your account and access to our services at our sole discretion, without prior notice, for conduct that we believe violates these Terms or is harmful to other users, us, or third parties.
sections.changes.title: Changes to Terms
sections.changes.content: We may modify these Terms at any time. We will notify users of any material changes by posting the new Terms on this page and updating the 'Last updated' date. Your continued use of our services after any changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.
